body_html:
Upon further inspection of the tutorial, it seems like it's incorrect. First we say:

dummy_input = Variable(torch.randn(10, 3, 224, 224)).cuda()

which makes sense for passing in 3-channel images. But then we say actual_input_1 is Float(1000), which doesn't make sense. So I think that tutorial needs to be updated and this PR is correct

body:
Upon further inspection of the tutorial, it seems like it's incorrect. First we say:
```
dummy_input = Variable(torch.randn(10, 3, 224, 224)).cuda()
```

which makes sense for passing in 3-channel images. But then we say `actual_input_1` is `Float(1000)`, which doesn't make sense. So I think that tutorial needs to be updated and this PR is correct
